response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering you the chance to purchase this item at a special price tailored to your interest. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $950,000. This offer reflects my commitment to finding a mutually beneficial solution while ensuring that I receive a fair return for the value of the product. I believe this price strikes a balance between the intrinsic worth of the product to both of us and allows for a successful transaction. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, and we can discuss the details further. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
